description: Adjust screen brightness. Parameter: Brightness level.
prompts: Can you increase the brightness level on my screen?
Make my screen a bit brighter, please.
I'd like to adjust the brightness to a higher level.
Dim the screen brightness to a lower setting.
Set my screen brightness to the middle level.
Could you enable Wi-Fi for me?
Turn off the Wi-Fi connection, please.
I'd like to connect to a Wi-Fi network.
Disable the Wi-Fi on my device.
Switch on the Wi-Fi settings.
Please activate Bluetooth on my device.
Can you turn off Bluetooth for me?
I need Bluetooth enabled right now.
Switch off the Bluetooth connection.
Turn on Bluetooth so I can connect my headset.
Raise the volume a little higher, please.
Lower the sound volume on my device.
Set the volume to maximum.
Adjust the volume to a medium level.
Can you decrease the volume slightly?
Please enable Airplane Mode.
Turn off Airplane Mode for me.
Activate Airplane Mode on my phone.
Disable Airplane Mode so I can use Wi-Fi.
Switch on Airplane Mode to disconnect all networks.
Can you activate Do Not Disturb?
Turn off Do Not Disturb for me.
Enable Do Not Disturb mode.
Disable Do Not Disturb so I can receive notifications.
Switch on Do Not Disturb to silence my phone.
Please turn on Cellular Data.
Disable Cellular Data on my device.
Activate the Cellular Data connection.
Turn off the mobile data for me.
Enable my phone's Cellular Data.
Can you set this image as my wallpaper?
Change my wallpaper to a different picture.
I'd like to update my home screen wallpaper.
Set a new background image for my phone.
Please change the wallpaper to this photo.
Can you enable Dark Mode?
Turn off Dark Mode for me.
Activate the dark theme on my device.
Switch off Dark Mode and go back to light mode.
Enable Dark Mode to save battery.

description: Adjust Text Size. Parameter: Text size level.
prompts: Can you make the text size larger?
Reduce the font size on my screen.
Adjust the text to a medium size.
Increase the font size for better readability.
Make the text smaller to fit more on the screen.
Please enable Location Services.
Turn off Location Services for me.
Activate GPS on my device.
Disable the location tracking.
Can you switch on Location Services?
Can you turn on the Personal Hotspot?
Disable my Personal Hotspot.
Enable hotspot so I can share my internet.
Switch off the Personal Hotspot for me.
Activate the Personal Hotspot feature.
Set the current date and time on my device.
Update the date to today’s date.
Can you change the time to 3 PM?
Adjust the time to match the local time zone.

description: Adjust Screen Auto-Lock. Parameter: Auto-lock duration.
prompts: Can you set the screen auto-lock to 1 minute?
Adjust the auto-lock timer to 5 minutes.
Change the auto-lock setting to 30 seconds.
Set the screen to never auto-lock.
Increase the auto-lock duration to 10 minutes.
Please turn on notifications for all apps.
Disable app notifications for me.
Activate notifications for Telegram.
Turn off notifications for Facebook.
Enable notifications so I don't miss updates.
Can you help me set a new passcode?
Change my phone's passcode.
Update the passcode to a more secure one.
Please set up a new passcode for me.
I'd like to reset my passcode.
Can you enable iCloud Backup?
Turn off iCloud Backup for me.
Activate iCloud Backup to save my data.
Disable the iCloud Backup feature.
Please switch on iCloud Backup.
Enable Find My iPhone on my device.
Can you disable Find My iPhone?
Turn on the Find My iPhone feature.
Deactivate Find My iPhone for me.
Switch on Find My iPhone for safety.
Can you set a new ringtone for my phone?
Change my ringtone to something different.
I'd like to update my ringtone.
Please set this sound as my ringtone.
Switch my ringtone to a custom tone.

description: Adjust Haptic Feedback. Parameter: Haptic level.
prompts: Can you increase the haptic feedback?
Reduce the vibration feedback on my phone.
Adjust the haptic feedback to medium.
Please make the haptic feedback stronger.
Set the haptic feedback to the lowest setting.
Enable app tracking transparency on my device.
Can you turn off app tracking?
Activate the app tracking transparency feature.
Disable tracking for all apps.
Switch on transparency for app tracking.
Please start screen recording.
Turn off screen recording for me.
Can you enable screen recording?
Stop the screen recording now.
Activate the screen recording feature.
Can you change my phone's language to Spanish?
Switch the language to French for me.
Set the region to United Kingdom.
Please change the region to Canada.
Please enable Siri on my device.
Turn off Siri for me.
Activate Siri for voice commands.
Can you disable Siri?
Switch on Siri to assist me.

description: Adjust Display Zoom. Parameter: Display zoom level.
prompts: Can you increase the display zoom?
Reduce the zoom level on my screen.
Adjust the display zoom to medium.
Please make the display zoomed in more.
Set the display zoom to the default level.
Please enable Emergency SOS on my phone.
Turn off the Emergency SOS feature.
Activate Emergency SOS for safety.
Can you disable Emergency SOS?
Switch on the Emergency SOS function.

description: Set Face ID & Passcode. Parameter: Face ID and passcode setup.
prompts: Can you help me set up Face ID?
Change my passcode and set up Face ID.
I’d like to update my Face ID settings.
Please set a new passcode with Face ID.
Configure Face ID for secure access.
Enable call waiting on my phone.
Turn off call waiting for me.
Activate call waiting for incoming calls.
Disable call waiting feature.

Turn off automatic software updates.
Enable software update notifications.
Please update my device to the latest software.
Switch off the software update feature.
Enable the battery percentage display.
Turn off battery percentage for me.
Activate the battery percentage indicator.
Disable the battery percentage display.
Show the battery percentage on my phone.

Set up a new VPN connection.
Update my VPN settings.

Can you enable True Tone on my screen?

Activate the True Tone feature.
Disable True Tone for my device.

Please enable Low Power Mode.
Turn off Low Power Mode for me.

Disable the Low Power Mode feature.

Enable automatic downloads for apps.
Turn off automatic downloads from the App Store.
Activate auto-downloads for new purchases.
Disable automatic app updates.
Switch on automatic downloads for apps.
Can you toggle my app privacy settings?
Change the privacy settings for all apps.
Adjust the privacy settings for better security.
Please enable stricter privacy controls.
Set the app privacy to the highest level.
Please enable Share My Location.
Turn off Share My Location for me.
Activate location sharing with my contacts.
Disable the Share My Location feature.
Switch on location sharing for safety.
Please enable Handoff on my device.
Turn off the Handoff feature for me.
Activate Handoff to switch between devices.

Turn off the VPN connection for me.
